articles.title: YouTube will start using AI to guess your age. If it’s wrong, you’ll have to prove it
articles.summary: YouTube will begin guessing users’ ages using artificial intelligence on Wednesday, as part of an effort to prevent kids from accessing inappropriate content online.
articles.translated_title: YouTube will start using AI to guess your age. If it’s wrong, you’ll have to prove it
articles.translated_summary: YouTube will begin guessing users’ ages using artificial intelligence on Wednesday, as part of an effort to prevent kids from accessing inappropriate content online.

articles.title: What happens when chatbots shape your reality? Concerns are growing online
articles.summary: As people turn to chatbots for increasingly important and intimate advice, some interactions playing out in public are causing alarm over just how much artificial intelligence can warp a user’s sense of reality
articles.translated_title: What happens when chatbots shape your reality? Concerns are growing online
articles.translated_summary: As people turn to chatbots for increasingly important and intimate advice, some interactions playing out in public are causing alarm over just how much artificial intelligence can warp a user’s sense of reality

articles.title: AI helps astronomers make a potentially major find - an exploding star being attacked by a black hole
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence helps astronomers observe what may be the first known case of a star exploding while interacting with a black hole.
articles.translated_title: AI helps astronomers make a potentially major find - an exploding star being attacked by a black hole
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence helps astronomers observe what may be the first known case of a star exploding while interacting with a black hole.

articles.title: Cisco earnings are out Wednesday. What top analysts expect to see
articles.summary: Cisco shares are up more than 20% year to date, largely driven by enthusiasm pouring into artificial intelligence infrastructure and cybersecurity demand.

articles.title: Tom Lee: Ethereum Is 'The Biggest Macro Trade' For The Next 10-15 Years
articles.summary: Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) could be the most significant macro investment opportunity over the next decade, according to Fundstrat co-founder Tom Lee, who points to the convergence of artificial intelligence, tokenization, and Wall Street's

articles.title: AI chip startup Rivos seeks up to $500 million in funding to take on Nvidia
articles.summary: In the race to supply the hardware behind artificial intelligence, few names have risen as quickly as Rivos. The Santa Clara startup, best known for its RISC-V-based server chips, pulled in $250 million just a year ago. Now it’s aiming much higher, with plans to raise between $400 million and $500 million in fresh capital,

articles.title: CoreWeave drops 14% on wider-than-expected loss ahead of lockup expiry
articles.summary: CoreWeave's stock dropped about 14% after the renter of artificial intelligence data centers reported a bigger-than-expected loss.
articles.translated_title: CoreWeave drops 14% on wider-than-expected loss ahead of lockup expiry

articles.title: Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
articles.summary: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
